full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDEN BZHI'I RNAM BSHAD 'KHRUL BRAL LUNG RIGS KYI NYI MA CHEN PO BO DZA HA RA,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES GANGS CAN MKHAS GRUB KUN GYI GTZUG RGYAN ^KUN MKHYEN CHEN PO 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I SDES MDZAD PA'I BDEN BZHI'I  RNAM BSHAD 'KHRUL BRAL LUNG RIGS KYI NYI MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI'ANG DAD LDAN DAR HAN CHOS RJES GANG CI'I MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE ZHUS DAG PA DKA' BCU DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO DKA' BCU RAB BRTAN RGYA MTSO GNYIS DANG, DO DAM BA JO RIGS THUR BA 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'PHEL DANG, RAB 'BYAMS PA KUN DGA' BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS DANG YIG MKHAN NGAG DBANG CHOS 'BYOR DANG SKOS MKHAN KUN DGA' BSTAN 'DZIN RNAMS KYIS BGYIS TE BAR DU SGRUB PA'I PAR BYANG DU SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG ZHU SER COM PAn 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG  'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
